pages.text:
The Golden Hen is a structurally redesigned and augmented vanilla chicken turned cyborg through the macabre construct called ''Der Elektrum-Ente''.
Lay Item: Golden Egg.$(br2)The conversion process takes 480KFE at 80FE/t, two liters of Molten Gold, a single chicken, and lasts for five minutes.
Process a vanilla chicken in ''Der Elektrum-Ente'', an electric gargantuan multiblock chicken.
